kinda not fun since you dont have middle east servers so my ping is always 200

"10/10, Best game. Casual is a nightmare at the time of this review due to BOTZ, but community servers are always fun, the community is more than welcoming to new players. Has a high skill ceiling as well, overall this has to be the best and most timeless shooter of all time. Besides it's a shooter game that has clever and expertly made movement mechanics unlike Call Of Duty, where it's the same damn game every year just with an even more ridiculous story than the last installment."

This game is a cinematic masterpiece, the characters and game-play are just the best, the movement is outstanding, I would highly recommend people to pick up this game and give it a try, I promise you... you'd have the most fun you ever had with this game.
One of the best FPS games ever made.

Fajn střílečka, vývoj se více soustředí ostatní hry takže moc updates nečekejte.
Začíná být trošku postarší, ale má to kreslenou grafiku, takže jen tak nezestárne.

I and my friends tried to play this to relive our childhood, but it took us 40 minutes to find a server we could all fit in, and when we did it turned out to be a farming server and people got mad at us for actually playing. The UI is terrible, it's impossible to join a friend's game from inside any menu in the game itself, and the game is buried under ungodly layers of feature creep cruft. It's essentially impossible to play now. I'm old and crusty and I need a regular videogame to play, dang it!!!
Good game and Valve FINALLY got up their arse and are now doing something about the bot problem
As someone that has over 500 hours I must say this is truly hell...

Team Fortress 2- это по истине удивительная, довольно старая игра которая не потеряла популярность до сих пор
. В игре присутствуют девять классов (наёмников) и дохрена режимов с картами. Разнообразные шапки и оружия на пару с режимами заскучать вам точно не дадут.

The direct hit is a balanced weapon. This is not only bias, but completely false. The direct hit is the most overpowered, ridiculous joke of a “fair” and “balanced” weapon. I have fought with and against the direct hit and I can confirm that the skill required to use this weapon is lacking; it took me only a few hours to become intermediate (Between awful to masterful). Given this, and it’s ability to one-shot light classes, makes it unfun to fight against and blatantly overpowered. Give this weapon to a solider main with 2,000 hours and he’ll wipe the entire enemy team with minimal effort. Did I also mention it does mini-crit damage to airborne targets? 184 damage to your centre mass. Most classes have less than 184.
эта игра очень понгравилась и в эту игру я хотел играть с самого детсва когда у двоюродного брата увидел эту игру
